kannadaText:
ಶ್ರೀ ವಿಷ್ಣು ವಿಶ್ವಾದಿ ಮೂಲ ಮಾಯಾಲೋಲ ।
ದೇವ ಸರ್ವೇಶ ಪರಬೊಮ್ಮನೆಂದು ಜನಂ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಕಾಣದೊಡಮಳ್ತಿಯಿಂ ನಂಬಿಹುದೊ ।
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧ ॥
transliteration:
shree viShNu vishvaadi moola maayaalola ।
deva sarvesha parabommanendu janam ॥
aavudanu kaanadodamaltiyim nambihudo ।
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 1 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Salutations to that wondrous one whom people call by various names like Sri Vishnu, the source of the universe, the playful one of Maya, God, the lord of all, the Supreme Brahman, whom they believe with love even though they cannot see him.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This opening verse pays homage to the Supreme Being who is known by many names. People believe in this wondrous one with love and devotion even though they cannot see him directly.

kannadaText:
ಜೀವನವೆಂಬುದು ನೀರಿನ ಗುಳ್ಳೆ
ಬೆಳಗಿ ಮರೆಯಾಗುವಂತೆ ಮಾಯೆಯಲಿ ॥
ಆವುದನು ನಿಜವೆಂದು ತಿಳಿಯಲಾಗದು
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪ ॥
transliteration:
jeevanavembudu neerina gulle
belagi mareyaaguvaante maayeyali ॥
aavudanu nijavendu tilayalaagadu
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 4 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Life is like a bubble of water that shines and disappears in illusion. We cannot understand what is truly real. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse beautifully captures the transient nature of life, comparing it to a water bubble that appears, shines briefly, and then disappears. It teaches us to understand the impermanent nature of worldly existence and the illusory nature of material reality.

kannadaText:
ಕಾಲವೆಂಬುದು ಕಾಲದ ಕಾಲ
ಎಲ್ಲವನು ತಿಂದು ತೀರಿಸುವ ಕಾಲ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಕಾಯಲಾಗದು ಕಾಲದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫ ॥
transliteration:
kaalavembudu kaalada kaala
ellavanu tindu teerisuva kaala ॥
aavudanu kaayalaagadu kaaladali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 5 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Time is the controller of time, consuming everything and completing all. Nothing can be preserved in time. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This profound verse speaks about the cyclical nature of time and how it governs everything in the universe. Time is the ultimate controller that consumes all things, and understanding its nature helps us live in harmony with the cosmic order.

kannadaText:
ಧರ್ಮವೆಂಬುದು ಧರ್ಮದ ಧರ್ಮ
ಎಲ್ಲರಿಗೂ ಸಮವಾದ ಧರ್ಮ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಮೀರಲಾಗದು ಧರ್ಮದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬ ॥
transliteration:
dharmavembudu dharmada dharma
ellarigoo samavaada dharma ॥
aavudanu meeralaagadu dharmadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 6 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Dharma is the foundation of dharma, equal for all. Nothing can transcend dharma. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the fundamental importance of dharma (righteousness) in life. Dharma is not just a concept but the very foundation upon which all other virtues and principles are built, and it applies equally to all beings.

kannadaText:
ಕರ್ಮವೆಂಬುದು ಕರ್ಮದ ಕರ್ಮ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಕಾರಣವಾದ ಕರ್ಮ ॥
ಆವುದನು ತಪ್ಪಿಸಲಾಗದು ಕರ್ಮದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೭ ॥
transliteration:
karmavembudu karmada karma
ellakkakoo kaaranavaada karma ॥
aavudanu tappisalaagadu karmadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 7 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Karma is the law of karma, the cause of everything. Nothing can escape karma. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse explains the law of karma - that every action has consequences. It teaches us to be mindful of our actions and to understand that we are responsible for the results of our deeds, and no one can escape the consequences of their actions.

kannadaText:
ಜ್ಞಾನವೆಂಬುದು ಜ್ಞಾನದ ಜ್ಞಾನ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಜ್ಞಾನ ॥
ಆವುದನು ತಿಳಿಯಲಾಗದು ಜ್ಞಾನದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೮ ॥
transliteration:
jnanavembudu jnanada jnana
ellakkakoo moolavaada jnana ॥
aavudanu tilayalaagadu jnanadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 8 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Knowledge is the essence of knowledge, the source of everything. Nothing can be understood without knowledge. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true knowledge and wisdom. It emphasizes that real knowledge is self-reflective and leads to deeper understanding of the self and the universe, and is the foundation of all understanding.

kannadaText:
ಮನುಷ್ಯರೋ ರಾಕ್ಷಸರೋ
ಎಲ್ಲರೂ ಒಂದೇ ರೂಪದವರು ॥
ಆವುದನು ತಿಳಿಯಲಾಗದು ಮನುಷ್ಯರಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೯ ॥
transliteration:
manushyaro rakshasaro
ellaroo onde roopadavaru ॥
aavudanu tilayalaagadu manushyarali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 9 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Are they humans or demons? All are of the same form. We cannot understand the nature of humans. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse questions the nature of human beings and their actions. It asks whether people are truly human in their behavior or if they act like demons, highlighting the dual nature of human character and the complexity of human behavior.

kannadaText:
ವಿದ್ಯೆಯೆಂಬುದು ವಿದ್ಯೆಯ ವಿದ್ಯೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ವಿದ್ಯೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ತಿಳಿಯಲಾಗದು ವಿದ್ಯೆಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೧ ॥
transliteration:
vidyeyembudu vidyeya vidye
ellakkakoo moolavaada vidye ॥
aavudanu tilayalaagadu vidyeyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 11 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Education is the essence of education, the foundation of everything. We cannot understand without education. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse highlights the importance of continuous learning and the transformative power of education. True education goes beyond mere academic knowledge to encompass life wisdom and is the foundation of all understanding.

kannadaText:
ಸತ್ಯವೆಂಬುದು ಸತ್ಯದ ಸತ್ಯ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸತ್ಯ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಮೀರಲಾಗದು ಸತ್ಯದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೨ ॥
transliteration:
satyavembudu satyada satya
ellakkakoo moolavaada satya ॥
aavudanu meeralaagadu satyadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 12 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Truth is the essence of truth, the foundation of everything. Nothing can transcend truth. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the absolute nature of truth and its fundamental importance in life. Truth is not relative but absolute, and living in truth is the highest virtue that forms the foundation of all existence.

kannadaText:
ಶಾಂತಿಯೆಂಬುದು ಶಾಂತಿಯ ಶಾಂತಿ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಶಾಂತಿ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಶಾಂತಿಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೩ ॥
transliteration:
shantiyembudu shantiya shanti
ellakkakoo moolavaada shanti ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu shantiyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 13 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Peace is the essence of peace, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without peace. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true peace - not just external calm but inner tranquility that comes from understanding and acceptance of life's realities. Peace is the foundation upon which all other virtues are built.

kannadaText:
ಪ್ರೀತಿಯೆಂಬುದು ಪ್ರೀತಿಯ ಪ್ರೀತಿ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಪ್ರೀತಿ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಪ್ರೀತಿಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೪ ॥
transliteration:
preetiyembudu preetiya preeti
ellakkakoo moolavaada preeti ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu preetiyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 14 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Love is the essence of love, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without love. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse explores the pure and unconditional nature of true love. It emphasizes that genuine love is selfless and transcends all boundaries and conditions, and is the foundation of all meaningful relationships and achievements.

kannadaText:
ಭಕ್ತಿಯೆಂಬುದು ಭಕ್ತಿಯ ಭಕ್ತಿ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಭಕ್ತಿ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಭಕ್ತಿಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೫ ॥
transliteration:
bhaktiyembudu bhaktiya bhakti
ellakkakoo moolavaada bhakti ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu bhaktiyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 15 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Devotion is the essence of devotion, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without devotion. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the pure and selfless nature of true devotion. It emphasizes that genuine devotion is not for personal gain but for the sake of devotion itself, and is the foundation of all spiritual progress.

kannadaText:
ಸೇವೆಯೆಂಬುದು ಸೇವೆಯ ಸೇವೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸೇವೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸೇವೆಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೬ ॥
transliteration:
seveyembudu seveye seva
ellakkakoo moolavaada seva ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu seveyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 16 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Service is the essence of service, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without service. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse highlights the importance of selfless service and its transformative power. True service is not done for recognition or reward but for the sake of service itself, and is the foundation of all meaningful achievements.

kannadaText:
ತ್ಯಾಗವೆಂಬುದು ತ್ಯಾಗದ ತ್ಯಾಗ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ತ್ಯಾಗ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ತ್ಯಾಗದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೭ ॥
transliteration:
tyagavembudu tyagada tyaga
ellakkakoo moolavaada tyaga ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu tyagadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 17 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Renunciation is the essence of renunciation, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without renunciation. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the highest form of renunciation - renouncing even the desire for renunciation itself. It teaches us about true detachment and freedom from all attachments, which is the foundation of spiritual liberation.

kannadaText:
ಸಂಯಮವೆಂಬುದು ಸಂಯಮದ ಸಂಯಮ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಂಯಮ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಂಯಮದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೮ ॥
transliteration:
samyamavembudu samyamada samyama
ellakkakoo moolavaada samyama ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu samyamadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 18 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Self-control is the essence of self-control, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without self-control. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of self-discipline and control over one's senses and mind. It teaches us that true self-control comes from understanding and mastery of the self, and is the foundation of all personal growth.

kannadaText:
ಧೈರ್ಯವೆಂಬುದು ಧೈರ್ಯದ ಧೈರ್ಯ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಧೈರ್ಯ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಧೈರ್ಯದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೧೯ ॥
transliteration:
dhairyavembudu dhairyada dhairya
ellakkakoo moolavaada dhairya ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu dhairyadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 19 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Courage is the essence of courage, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without courage. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse teaches us about the importance of courage in facing life's challenges and standing up for what is right. Courage is the foundation of all achievements.

kannadaText:
ಸಹನೆಯೆಂಬುದು ಸಹನೆಯ ಸಹನೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಹನೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಹನೆಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೦ ॥
transliteration:
sahaneyembudu sahaneya sahane
ellakkakoo moolavaada sahane ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu sahaneyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 20 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Patience is the essence of patience, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without patience. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of patience in life. True patience is not just waiting but maintaining inner calm and composure in the face of difficulties and delays, and is the foundation of all enduring achievements.

kannadaText:
ವಿನಯವೆಂಬುದು ವಿನಯದ ವಿನಯ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ವಿನಯ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ವಿನಯದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೧ ॥
transliteration:
vinayavembudu vinayada vinaya
ellakkakoo moolavaada vinaya ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu vinayadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 21 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Humility is the essence of humility, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without humility. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse teaches us about the importance of humility in life. True humility is not weakness but strength that comes from self-awareness and respect for others, and is the foundation of all learning and growth.

kannadaText:
ಸತ್ಯವೆಂಬುದು ಸತ್ಯದ ಸತ್ಯ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸತ್ಯ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಮೀರಲಾಗದು ಸತ್ಯದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೨ ॥
transliteration:
satyavembudu satyada satya
ellakkakoo moolavaada satya ॥
aavudanu meeralaagadu satyadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 22 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Truth is the essence of truth, the foundation of everything. Nothing can transcend truth. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the absolute nature of truth and its fundamental importance in life. Truth is not relative but absolute, and living in truth is the highest virtue that forms the foundation of all existence.

kannadaText:
ಅಹಿಂಸೆಯೆಂಬುದು ಅಹಿಂಸೆಯ ಅಹಿಂಸೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಅಹಿಂಸೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಅಹಿಂಸೆಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೩ ॥
transliteration:
ahimsayembudu ahimsaye ahimse
ellakkakoo moolavaada ahimse ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu ahimseyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 23 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Non-violence is the essence of non-violence, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without non-violence. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the principle of non-violence (ahimsa) which extends beyond physical harm to include mental and emotional harm. It teaches us that true peace and harmony can only be achieved through non-violence in thought, word, and deed.

kannadaText:
ಸಮಾನತೆಯೆಂಬುದು ಸಮಾನತೆಯ ಸಮಾನತೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಮಾನತೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಮಾನತೆಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೪ ॥
transliteration:
samaanateyembudu samaanateye samaanate
ellakkakoo moolavaada samaanate ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu samaanateyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 24 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Equality is the essence of equality, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without equality. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of treating all beings with equal respect and dignity. True equality goes beyond social status, wealth, or background and recognizes the inherent worth of every individual.

kannadaText:
ಸ್ವಾತಂತ್ರ್ಯವೆಂಬುದು ಸ್ವಾತಂತ್ರ್ಯದ ಸ್ವಾತಂತ್ರ್ಯ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸ್ವಾತಂತ್ರ್ಯ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸ್ವಾತಂತ್ರ್ಯದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೫ ॥
transliteration:
swatantryavembudu swatantryada swatantrya
ellakkakoo moolavaada swatantrya ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu swatantryadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 25 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Freedom is the essence of freedom, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without freedom. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the true nature of freedom - not just external liberty but inner freedom from attachments, desires, and fears. True freedom is the foundation of all spiritual and personal growth.

kannadaText:
ಸೌಭ್ರಾತೃವೆಂಬುದು ಸೌಭ್ರಾತೃದ ಸೌಭ್ರಾತೃ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸೌಭ್ರಾತೃ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸೌಭ್ರಾತೃದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೬ ॥
transliteration:
saubhratruvembudu saubhratruda saubhratru
ellakkakoo moolavaada saubhratru ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu saubhratrudali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 26 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Brotherhood is the essence of brotherhood, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without brotherhood. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of universal brotherhood and the recognition that all human beings are part of one family. True brotherhood transcends differences and creates harmony in society.

kannadaText:
ಸೌಹಾರ್ದವೆಂಬುದು ಸೌಹಾರ್ದದ ಸೌಹಾರ್ದ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸೌಹಾರ್ದ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸೌಹಾರ್ದದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೭ ॥
transliteration:
sauhardavembudu sauhardada sauharda
ellakkakoo moolavaada sauharda ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu sauhardadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 27 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Friendship is the essence of friendship, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without friendship. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the pure and selfless nature of true friendship. Genuine friendship is based on mutual respect, trust, and support, and is the foundation of meaningful relationships.

kannadaText:
ಸೌಂದರ್ಯವೆಂಬುದು ಸೌಂದರ್ಯದ ಸೌಂದರ್ಯ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸೌಂದರ್ಯ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸೌಂದರ್ಯದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೮ ॥
transliteration:
saundaryavembudu saundaryada saundarya
ellakkakoo moolavaada saundarya ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu saundaryadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 28 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Beauty is the essence of beauty, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without beauty. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true beauty - not just external appearance but inner beauty that radiates from a pure heart and noble character. True beauty is the foundation of all aesthetic and spiritual experiences.

kannadaText:
ಸೌಖ್ಯವೆಂಬುದು ಸೌಖ್ಯದ ಸೌಖ್ಯ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸೌಖ್ಯ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸೌಖ್ಯದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೨೯ ॥
transliteration:
saukhyavembudu saukhyada saukhya
ellakkakoo moolavaada saukhya ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu saukhyadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 29 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Happiness is the essence of happiness, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without happiness. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse teaches us about the nature of true happiness - not dependent on external circumstances but arising from inner contentment and peace. True happiness is the foundation of all fulfillment in life.

kannadaText:
ಸೌಜನ್ಯವೆಂಬುದು ಸೌಜನ್ಯದ ಸೌಜನ್ಯ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸೌಜನ್ಯ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸೌಜನ್ಯದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೦ ॥
transliteration:
saujanyavembudu saujanyada saujanya
ellakkakoo moolavaada saujanya ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu saujanyadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 30 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Nobility is the essence of nobility, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without nobility. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true nobility - not based on birth or wealth but on character, integrity, and moral excellence. True nobility is the foundation of all virtuous living.

kannadaText:
ಜೀವನವೆಂಬುದು ಜೀವನದ ಜೀವನ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಜೀವನ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಜೀವನದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೧ ॥
transliteration:
jeevanavembudu jeevanada jeevana
ellakkakoo moolavaada jeevana ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu jeevanadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 31 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Life is the essence of life, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without life. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the preciousness and sanctity of life itself. True life is not just physical existence but living with awareness, purpose, and meaning.

kannadaText:
ಮರಣವೆಂಬುದು ಮರಣದ ಮರಣ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಮರಣ ॥
ಆವುದನು ತಪ್ಪಿಸಲಾಗದು ಮರಣದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೨ ॥
transliteration:
maranavembudu maranada marana
ellakkakoo moolavaada marana ॥
aavudanu tappisalaagadu maranadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 32 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Death is the essence of death, the foundation of everything. Nothing can escape death. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse teaches us about the inevitability of death and its role in the cycle of life. Understanding death helps us live more meaningfully and appreciate the preciousness of life.

kannadaText:
ಜನ್ಮವೆಂಬುದು ಜನ್ಮದ ಜನ್ಮ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಜನ್ಮ ॥
ಆವುದನು ತಪ್ಪಿಸಲಾಗದು ಜನ್ಮದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೩ ॥
transliteration:
janmavembudu janmada janma
ellakkakoo moolavaada janma ॥
aavudanu tappisalaagadu janmadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 33 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Birth is the essence of birth, the foundation of everything. Nothing can escape birth. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the cycle of birth and rebirth, emphasizing that birth is not just a physical event but a spiritual opportunity for growth and learning.

kannadaText:
ವೃದ್ಧಿಯೆಂಬುದು ವೃದ್ಧಿಯ ವೃದ್ಧಿ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ವೃದ್ಧಿ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ವೃದ್ಧಿಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೪ ॥
transliteration:
vriddhiyembudu vriddhiya vriddhi
ellakkakoo moolavaada vriddhi ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu vriddhiyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 34 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Growth is the essence of growth, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without growth. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of continuous growth and development in all aspects of life - physical, mental, and spiritual. True growth is the foundation of all progress.

kannadaText:
ಕ್ಷಯವೆಂಬುದು ಕ್ಷಯದ ಕ್ಷಯ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಕ್ಷಯ ॥
ಆವುದನು ತಪ್ಪಿಸಲಾಗದು ಕ್ಷಯದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೫ ॥
transliteration:
kshayavembudu kshayada kshaya
ellakkakoo moolavaada kshaya ॥
aavudanu tappisalaagadu kshayadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 35 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Decay is the essence of decay, the foundation of everything. Nothing can escape decay. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse teaches us about the natural process of decay and impermanence in all things. Understanding decay helps us appreciate the transient nature of material existence.

kannadaText:
ಸಂಸಾರವೆಂಬುದು ಸಂಸಾರದ ಸಂಸಾರ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಂಸಾರ ॥
ಆವುದನು ತಪ್ಪಿಸಲಾಗದು ಸಂಸಾರದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೬ ॥
transliteration:
samsaravembudu samsarada samsara
ellakkakoo moolavaada samsara ॥
aavudanu tappisalaagadu samsaradali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 36 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Worldly life is the essence of worldly life, the foundation of everything. Nothing can escape worldly life. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of samsara - the cycle of worldly existence with its joys and sorrows. It teaches us to understand and transcend the attachments of worldly life.

kannadaText:
ಮೋಕ್ಷವೆಂಬುದು ಮೋಕ್ಷದ ಮೋಕ್ಷ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಮೋಕ್ಷ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಮೋಕ್ಷದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೭ ॥
transliteration:
mokshavembudu mokshada moksha
ellakkakoo moolavaada moksha ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu mokshadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 37 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Liberation is the essence of liberation, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without liberation. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about moksha - the ultimate liberation from the cycle of birth and death. True liberation is freedom from all attachments and the realization of one's true nature.

kannadaText:
ಯೋಗವೆಂಬುದು ಯೋಗದ ಯೋಗ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಯೋಗ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಯೋಗದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೮ ॥
transliteration:
yogavembudu yogada yoga
ellakkakoo moolavaada yoga ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu yogadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 38 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Yoga is the essence of yoga, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without yoga. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the true nature of yoga - not just physical exercise but the union of individual consciousness with the universal consciousness. Yoga is the path to self-realization.

kannadaText:
ತಪಸ್ಸೆಂಬುದು ತಪಸ್ಸಿನ ತಪಸ್ಸು
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ತಪಸ್ಸು ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ತಪಸ್ಸಿನಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೩೯ ॥
transliteration:
tapassembudu tapassina tapassu
ellakkakoo moolavaada tapassu ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu tapassinalli
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 39 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Austerity is the essence of austerity, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without austerity. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about tapas - spiritual discipline and austerity. True tapas is not just physical penance but the inner discipline that leads to spiritual purification and strength.

kannadaText:
ಧ್ಯಾನವೆಂಬುದು ಧ್ಯಾನದ ಧ್ಯಾನ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಧ್ಯಾನ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಧ್ಯಾನದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೦ ॥
transliteration:
dhyanavembudu dhyanada dhyana
ellakkakoo moolavaada dhyana ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu dhyanadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 40 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Meditation is the essence of meditation, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without meditation. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of meditation in spiritual practice. True meditation is not just sitting quietly but the focused concentration that leads to inner peace and self-realization.

kannadaText:
ಮಂತ್ರವೆಂಬುದು ಮಂತ್ರದ ಮಂತ್ರ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಮಂತ್ರ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಮಂತ್ರದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೧ ॥
transliteration:
mantravembudu mantrada mantra
ellakkakoo moolavaada mantra ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu mantradali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 41 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Mantra is the essence of mantra, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without mantra. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the power of mantras - sacred sounds and words that have spiritual significance. True mantras are not just words but vehicles for spiritual transformation.

kannadaText:
ಪೂಜೆಯೆಂಬುದು ಪೂಜೆಯ ಪೂಜೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಪೂಜೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಪೂಜೆಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೨ ॥
transliteration:
poojeyembudu poojeye pooje
ellakkakoo moolavaada pooje ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu poojeyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 42 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Worship is the essence of worship, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without worship. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true worship - not just external rituals but the inner attitude of reverence and devotion. True worship is the foundation of spiritual practice.

kannadaText:
ಅರ್ಚನೆಯೆಂಬುದು ಅರ್ಚನೆಯ ಅರ್ಚನೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಅರ್ಚನೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಅರ್ಚನೆಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೩ ॥
transliteration:
archaneyembudu archaneye archane
ellakkakoo moolavaada archane ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu archaneyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 43 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Ritual worship is the essence of ritual worship, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without ritual worship. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of ritual worship in spiritual practice. True archana is not just mechanical performance but conscious offering with devotion and understanding.

kannadaText:
ಸ್ತೋತ್ರವೆಂಬುದು ಸ್ತೋತ್ರದ ಸ್ತೋತ್ರ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸ್ತೋತ್ರ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸ್ತೋತ್ರದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೪ ॥
transliteration:
stotravembudu stotrada stotra
ellakkakoo moolavaada stotra ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu stotradali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 44 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Hymn is the essence of hymn, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without hymn. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the power of devotional hymns and prayers. True stotra is not just recitation but heartfelt expression of devotion and gratitude to the divine.

kannadaText:
ಪ್ರಾರ್ಥನೆಯೆಂಬುದು ಪ್ರಾರ್ಥನೆಯ ಪ್ರಾರ್ಥನೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಪ್ರಾರ್ಥನೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಪ್ರಾರ್ಥನೆಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೫ ॥
transliteration:
prarthaneyembudu prarthaneya prarthane
ellakkakoo moolavaada prarthane ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu prarthaneyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 45 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Prayer is the essence of prayer, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without prayer. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of prayer in spiritual life. True prayer is not just asking for favors but sincere communication with the divine and surrender of the ego.

kannadaText:
ಉಪಾಸನೆಯೆಂಬುದು ಉಪಾಸನೆಯ ಉಪಾಸನೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಉಪಾಸನೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಉಪಾಸನೆಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೬ ॥
transliteration:
upasaneyembudu upasaneya upasane
ellakkakoo moolavaada upasane ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu upasaneyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 46 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Contemplation is the essence of contemplation, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without contemplation. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the practice of upasana - deep contemplation and meditation on the divine. True upasana leads to direct experience and realization of the divine presence.

kannadaText:
ಸಾಧನೆಯೆಂಬುದು ಸಾಧನೆಯ ಸಾಧನೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಾಧನೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಾಧನೆಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೭ ॥
transliteration:
sadhaneyembudu sadhaneya sadhane
ellakkakoo moolavaada sadhane ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu sadhaneyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 47 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Spiritual practice is the essence of spiritual practice, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without spiritual practice. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of consistent spiritual practice (sadhana). True sadhana is not just occasional practice but regular, disciplined effort towards spiritual goals.

kannadaText:
ಸಿದ್ಧಿಯೆಂಬುದು ಸಿದ್ಧಿಯ ಸಿದ್ಧಿ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಿದ್ಧಿ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಿದ್ಧಿಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೮ ॥
transliteration:
siddhiyembudu siddhiya siddhi
ellakkakoo moolavaada siddhi ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu siddhiyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 48 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Perfection is the essence of perfection, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without perfection. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about siddhi - spiritual powers and perfection. True siddhi is not just supernatural powers but the perfection of character and spiritual realization.

kannadaText:
ಸಂಪತ್ತೆಂಬುದು ಸಂಪತ್ತಿನ ಸಂಪತ್ತು
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಂಪತ್ತು ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಂಪತ್ತಿನಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೪೯ ॥
transliteration:
sampattembudu sampattina sampattu
ellakkakoo moolavaada sampattu ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu sampattinalli
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 49 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Wealth is the essence of wealth, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without wealth. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true wealth - not just material possessions but spiritual riches and inner abundance. True wealth is the foundation of all prosperity.

kannadaText:
ಕೀರ್ತಿಯೆಂಬುದು ಕೀರ್ತಿಯ ಕೀರ್ತಿ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಕೀರ್ತಿ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಕೀರ್ತಿಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೦ ॥
transliteration:
keertiyembudu keertiya keerti
ellakkakoo moolavaada keerti ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu keertiyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 50 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Fame is the essence of fame, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without fame. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true fame - not just worldly recognition but the good reputation that comes from virtuous living and noble deeds.

kannadaText:
ಯಶಸ್ಸೆಂಬುದು ಯಶಸ್ಸಿನ ಯಶಸ್ಸು
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಯಶಸ್ಸು ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಯಶಸ್ಸಿನಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೧ ॥
transliteration:
yashassembudu yashassina yashassu
ellakkakoo moolavaada yashassu ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu yashassinalli
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 51 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Success is the essence of success, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without success. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true success - not just material achievements but the fulfillment that comes from living according to dharma and serving others.

kannadaText:
ವಿಜಯವೆಂಬುದು ವಿಜಯದ ವಿಜಯ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ವಿಜಯ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ವಿಜಯದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೨ ॥
transliteration:
vijayavembudu vijayada vijaya
ellakkakoo moolavaada vijaya ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu vijayadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 52 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Victory is the essence of victory, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without victory. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true victory - not just winning over others but conquering one's own weaknesses and achieving self-mastery.

kannadaText:
ಶ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸೆಂಬುದು ಶ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸಿನ ಶ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸು
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಶ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸು ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಶ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸಿನಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೩ ॥
transliteration:
shreyassembudu shreyassina shreyassu
ellakkakoo moolavaada shreyassu ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu shreyassinalli
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 53 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Welfare is the essence of welfare, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without welfare. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about shreyas - the highest good and welfare. True welfare is not just personal benefit but the well-being of all beings and the greater good of society.

kannadaText:
ಭ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸೆಂಬುದು ಭ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸಿನ ಭ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸು
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಭ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸು ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಭ್ರೇಯಸ್ಸಿನಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೪ ॥
transliteration:
bhreyassembudu bhreyassina bhreyassu
ellakkakoo moolavaada bhreyassu ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu bhreyassinalli
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 54 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Pleasure is the essence of pleasure, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without pleasure. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about preyas - worldly pleasures and comforts. While pleasures are part of life, true fulfillment comes from balancing worldly pleasures with spiritual growth.

kannadaText:
ಸುಖವೆಂಬುದು ಸುಖದ ಸುಖ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸುಖ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸುಖದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೫ ॥
transliteration:
sukhavembudu sukhada sukha
ellakkakoo moolavaada sukha ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu sukhadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 55 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Happiness is the essence of happiness, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without happiness. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true happiness - not dependent on external circumstances but arising from inner contentment and peace. True happiness is the foundation of all fulfillment.

kannadaText:
ದುಃಖವೆಂಬುದು ದುಃಖದ ದುಃಖ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ದುಃಖ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ದುಃಖದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೬ ॥
transliteration:
duhkhavembudu duhkhada duhkha
ellakkakoo moolavaada duhkha ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu duhkhadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 56 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Sorrow is the essence of sorrow, the foundation of everything. Nothing can escape sorrow. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse teaches us about the nature of sorrow and suffering in life. Understanding sorrow helps us develop compassion and empathy, and learn to transcend it through spiritual practice.

kannadaText:
ಆನಂದವೆಂಬುದು ಆನಂದದ ಆನಂದ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಆನಂದ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಆನಂದದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೭ ॥
transliteration:
aanandavembudu aanandada aananda
ellakkakoo moolavaada aananda ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu aanandadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 57 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Bliss is the essence of bliss, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without bliss. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about ananda - the supreme bliss that comes from spiritual realization. True bliss is not temporary pleasure but the eternal joy of self-realization.

kannadaText:
ಶಾಂತಿಯೆಂಬುದು ಶಾಂತಿಯ ಶಾಂತಿ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಶಾಂತಿ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಶಾಂತಿಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೮ ॥
transliteration:
shantiyembudu shantiya shanti
ellakkakoo moolavaada shanti ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu shantiyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 58 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Peace is the essence of peace, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without peace. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of inner peace and tranquility. True peace is not the absence of problems but the ability to remain calm and centered amidst life's challenges.

kannadaText:
ಪ್ರಸನ್ನತೆಯೆಂಬುದು ಪ್ರಸನ್ನತೆಯ ಪ್ರಸನ್ನತೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಪ್ರಸನ್ನತೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಪ್ರಸನ್ನತೆಯಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೫೯ ॥
transliteration:
prasannateyembudu prasannateye prasannate
ellakkakoo moolavaada prasannate ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu prasannateyali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 59 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Cheerfulness is the essence of cheerfulness, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without cheerfulness. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the importance of maintaining a cheerful and positive attitude in life. True cheerfulness comes from inner contentment and spreads joy to others.

kannadaText:
ಸಂತೋಷವೆಂಬುದು ಸಂತೋಷದ ಸಂತೋಷ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಂತೋಷ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಂತೋಷದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೦ ॥
transliteration:
santoshavembudu santoshada santosha
ellakkakoo moolavaada santosha ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu santoshadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 60 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Contentment is the essence of contentment, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without contentment. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of santosha - contentment with what one has. True contentment is not complacency but the ability to find satisfaction in the present moment.

kannadaText:
ಸಂಯಮವೆಂಬುದು ಸಂಯಮದ ಸಂಯಮ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಂಯಮ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಂಯಮದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೧ ॥
transliteration:
samyamavembudu samyamada samyama
ellakkakoo moolavaada samyama ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu samyamadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 61 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Self-control is the essence of self-control, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without self-control. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of self-discipline and control over one's senses and mind. True self-control is the foundation of all personal growth and spiritual progress.

kannadaText:
ಸಂಕಲ್ಪವೆಂಬುದು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪದ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೨ ॥
transliteration:
sankalpavembudu sankalpada sankalpa
ellakkakoo moolavaada sankalpa ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu sankalpadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 62 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Resolution is the essence of resolution, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without resolution. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the power of sankalpa - firm resolve and determination. True resolution is not just making plans but having the unwavering commitment to achieve one's goals.

kannadaText:
ಸಂಕಲ್ಪವೆಂಬುದು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪದ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೩ ॥
transliteration:
sankalpavembudu sankalpada sankalpa
ellakkakoo moolavaada sankalpa ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu sankalpadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 63 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Intention is the essence of intention, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without intention. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of pure intention in all actions. True intention is not just what we want to do but the underlying motivation and purpose behind our actions.

kannadaText:
ಸಂಕಲ್ಪವೆಂಬುದು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪದ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೪ ॥
transliteration:
sankalpavembudu sankalpada sankalpa
ellakkakoo moolavaada sankalpa ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu sankalpadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 64 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Will is the essence of will, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without will. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the power of will - the inner strength and determination that drives us forward. True will is not stubbornness but the focused energy to achieve our goals.

kannadaText:
ಸಂಕಲ್ಪವೆಂಬುದು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪದ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೫ ॥
transliteration:
sankalpavembudu sankalpada sankalpa
ellakkakoo moolavaada sankalpa ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu sankalpadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 65 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Desire is the essence of desire, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without desire. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of desire - not just worldly cravings but the pure aspiration for spiritual growth and self-realization. True desire is the driving force behind all achievement.

kannadaText:
ಸಂಕಲ್ಪವೆಂಬುದು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪದ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೬ ॥
transliteration:
sankalpavembudu sankalpada sankalpa
ellakkakoo moolavaada sankalpa ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu sankalpadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 66 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Thought is the essence of thought, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without thought. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the power of thought - the creative force that shapes our reality. True thought is not just mental activity but the conscious direction of our mental energy.

kannadaText:
ಸಂಕಲ್ಪವೆಂಬುದು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪದ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಂಕಲ್ಪ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ ೬೭ ॥
transliteration:
sankalpavembudu sankalpada sankalpa
ellakkakoo moolavaada sankalpa ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu sankalpadali
aa vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 67 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Speech is the essence of speech, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without speech. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the power of speech - the ability to communicate and express our thoughts and feelings. True speech is not just talking but meaningful communication that uplifts others.

ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 174 ॥
transliteration:
shashvatavembudu shashvatada shashvata
ellakkakoo moolavaada shashvata ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu shashvatadali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 174 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Eternity is the essence of eternity, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without eternity. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the nature of eternity - not just endless time but the timeless reality that transcends all temporal limitations. True eternity is the foundation of all permanence.

kannadaText:

ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಅಮರತ್ವದಲಿ

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Immortality is the essence of immortality, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without immortality. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true immortality - not just endless life but the deathless reality that transcends all mortality. True immortality is the foundation of all spiritual liberation.

kannadaText:

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Divinity is the essence of divinity, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without divinity. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the nature of true divinity - not just godliness but the inherent sacredness of all existence. True divinity is the foundation of all spiritual experience.

kannadaText:

ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಪವಿತ್ರತೆ ॥

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Sacredness is the essence of sacredness, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without sacredness. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true sacredness - not just religious significance but the inherent holiness of all creation. True sacredness is the foundation of all reverence.

kannadaText:

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Transcendence is the essence of transcendence, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without transcendence. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the nature of true transcendence - not just going beyond but rising above all limitations and realizing the infinite. True transcendence is the foundation of all spiritual liberation.

kannadaText:

jeevanavembudu jeevanada jeevana

aavudanu padeyalaagadu jeevanadali

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Life is the essence of life, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without life. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the preciousness and sanctity of life itself. True life is not just physical existence but living with awareness, purpose, and meaning.

kannadaText:

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Death is the essence of death, the foundation of everything. Nothing can escape death. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse teaches us about the inevitability of death and its role in the cycle of life. Understanding death helps us live more meaningfully and appreciate the preciousness of life.

kannadaText:

ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಜನ್ಮದಲಿ

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Birth is the essence of birth, the foundation of everything. Nothing can escape birth. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the cycle of birth and rebirth, emphasizing that birth is not just a physical event but a spiritual opportunity for growth and learning.

kannadaText:

ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ವೃದ್ಧಿದಲಿ

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Growth is the essence of growth, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without growth. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of continuous growth and development in all aspects of life - physical, mental, and spiritual. True growth is the foundation of all progress.

ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಕ್ಷಯದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 183 ॥
transliteration:

ellakkakoo moolavaada kshaya ॥

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Decay is the essence of decay, the foundation of everything. Nothing can escape decay. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse teaches us about the natural process of decay and impermanence in all things. Understanding decay helps us appreciate the transient nature of material existence.

kannadaText:

ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಂಸಾರದಲಿ

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Worldly life is the essence of worldly life, the foundation of everything. Nothing can escape worldly life. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of samsara - the cycle of worldly existence with its joys and sorrows. It teaches us to understand and transcend the attachments of worldly life.

kannadaText:

ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಮುಕ್ತಿದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 185 ॥

ellakkakoo moolavaada mukti ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu muktidali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 185 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Liberation is the essence of liberation, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without liberation. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about moksha - the ultimate liberation from the cycle of birth and death. True liberation is freedom from all attachments and the realization of one's true nature.

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Self-control is the essence of self-control, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without self-control. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of self-discipline and control over one's senses and mind. True self-control is the foundation of all personal growth and spiritual progress.

ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಂಕಲ್ಪದಲಿ

aavudanu padeyalaagadu sankalpadali

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Resolution is the essence of resolution, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without resolution. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the power of sankalpa - firm resolve and determination. True resolution is not just making plans but having the unwavering commitment to achieve one's goals.

kannadaText:

ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಉದ್ದೇಶದಲಿ

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Intention is the essence of intention, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without intention. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of pure intention in all actions. True intention is not just what we want to do but the underlying motivation and purpose behind our actions.

ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಇಚ್ಛೆದಲಿ

ellakkakoo moolavaada icche ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu icchedali

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Will is the essence of will, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without will. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the power of will - the inner strength and determination that drives us forward. True will is not stubbornness but the focused energy to achieve our goals.

kannadaText:
ಬಯಕೆವೆಂಬುದು ಬಯಕೆದ ಬಯಕೆ

ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಬಯಕೆದಲಿ

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Desire is the essence of desire, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without desire. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of desire - not just worldly cravings but the pure aspiration for spiritual growth and self-realization. True desire is the driving force behind all achievement.

kannadaText:

ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಭಾವನೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಭಾವನೆದಲಿ

transliteration:

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Thought is the essence of thought, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without thought. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the power of thought - the creative force that shapes our reality. True thought is not just mental activity but the conscious direction of our mental energy.

kannadaText:
ಮಾತುವೆಂಬುದು ಮಾತುದ ಮಾತು

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Speech is the essence of speech, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without speech. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the power of speech - the ability to communicate and express our thoughts and feelings. True speech is not just talking but meaningful communication that uplifts others.

kannadaText:
ಕ್ರಿಯೆವೆಂಬುದು ಕ್ರಿಯೆದ ಕ್ರಿಯೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಕ್ರಿಯೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಕ್ರಿಯೆದಲಿ

transliteration:
kriyevembudu kriyeda kriye

aavudanu padeyalaagadu kriyedali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 193 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Action is the essence of action, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without action. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of action - not just physical activity but conscious, purposeful action that aligns with our values and goals. True action is the bridge between thought and achievement.

kannadaText:
ಅರಿವುವೆಂಬುದು ಅರಿವುದ ಅರಿವು

ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಅರಿವುದಲಿ

transliteration:
arivuvembudu arivuda arivu

aavudanu padeyalaagadu arivudali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 194 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Understanding is the essence of understanding, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without understanding. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true understanding - not just knowing facts but comprehending the deeper meaning and significance of things. True understanding is the foundation of all insight.

kannadaText:
ತಿಳಿವಳಿಕೆವೆಂಬುದು ತಿಳಿವಳಿಕೆದ ತಿಳಿವಳಿಕೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ತಿಳಿವಳಿಕೆ ॥

tilivalikevembudu tilivalikeda tilivalike

englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Death is the essence of death, the foundation of everything. Nothing can escape death. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse teaches us about the inevitability of death and its role in the cycle of life. Understanding death helps us live more meaningfully and appreciate the preciousness of life.

kannadaText:
ಅರಿವುವೆಂಬುದು ಅರಿವುದ ಅರಿವು
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಅರಿವು ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಅರಿವುದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 347 ॥
transliteration:
arivuvembudu arivuda arivu
ellakkakoo moolavaada arivu ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu arivudali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 347 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Understanding is the essence of understanding, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without understanding. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true understanding - not just knowing facts but comprehending the deeper meaning and significance of things. True understanding is the foundation of all insight.

kannadaText:
ತಿಳಿವಳಿಕೆವೆಂಬುದು ತಿಳಿವಳಿಕೆದ ತಿಳಿವಳಿಕೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ತಿಳಿವಳಿಕೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ತಿಳಿವಳಿಕೆದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 348 ॥
transliteration:
tilivalikevembudu tilivalikeda tilivalike
ellakkakoo moolavaada tilivalike ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu tilivalikedali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 348 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Realization is the essence of realization, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without realization. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of realization - not just intellectual understanding but direct experience and insight. True realization is the foundation of all spiritual progress.

kannadaText:
ಜಾಗೃತಿವೆಂಬುದು ಜಾಗೃತಿದ ಜಾಗೃತಿ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಜಾಗೃತಿ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಜಾಗೃತಿದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 349 ॥
transliteration:
jagrutivembudu jagrutida jagruti
ellakkakoo moolavaada jagruti ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu jagrutidali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 349 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Awareness is the essence of awareness, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without awareness. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true awareness - not just being conscious but being fully present and mindful. True awareness is the foundation of all conscious living.

kannadaText:
ಚೇತನವೆಂಬುದು ಚೇತನದ ಚೇತನ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಚೇತನ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಚೇತನದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 350 ॥
transliteration:
chetanavembudu chetanada chetana
ellakkakoo moolavaada chetana ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu chetanadali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 350 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Consciousness is the essence of consciousness, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without consciousness. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of consciousness - the fundamental awareness that underlies all experience. True consciousness is the foundation of all existence.

kannadaText:
ಅಸ್ತಿತ್ವವೆಂಬುದು ಅಸ್ತಿತ್ವದ ಅಸ್ತಿತ್ವ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಅಸ್ತಿತ್ವ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಅಸ್ತಿತ್ವದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 351 ॥
transliteration:
astitvavembudu astitvada astitva
ellakkakoo moolavaada astitva ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu astitvadali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 351 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Being is the essence of being, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without being. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true being - not just existing but being fully present and authentic. True being is the foundation of all authentic living.

kannadaText:
ಇರುವಿಕೆವೆಂಬುದು ಇರುವಿಕೆದ ಇರುವಿಕೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಇರುವಿಕೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಇರುವಿಕೆದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 352 ॥
transliteration:
iruvikevembudu iruvikeda iruvike
ellakkakoo moolavaada iruvike ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu iruvikedali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 352 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Existence is the essence of existence, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without existence. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the fundamental nature of existence - the basic fact of being that underlies all reality. True existence is the foundation of all that is.

kannadaText:
ವಾಸ್ತವವೆಂಬುದು ವಾಸ್ತವದ ವಾಸ್ತವ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ವಾಸ್ತವ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ವಾಸ್ತವದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 353 ॥
transliteration:
vastavavembudu vastavada vastava
ellakkakoo moolavaada vastava ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu vastavadali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 353 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Reality is the essence of reality, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without reality. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true reality - not just what appears to be but what actually is. True reality is the foundation of all genuine understanding.

kannadaText:
ಮಂಗಳವೆಂಬುದು ಮಂಗಳದ ಮಂಗಳ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಮಂಗಳ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಮಂಗಳದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 354 ॥
transliteration:
mangalavembudu mangalada mangala
ellakkakoo moolavaada mangala ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu mangaladali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 354 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Goodness is the essence of goodness, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without goodness. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true goodness - not just moral behavior but the inherent quality of being that benefits all. True goodness is the foundation of all virtue.

kannadaText:
ರೂಪವೆಂಬುದು ರೂಪದ ರೂಪ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ರೂಪ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ರೂಪದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 355 ॥
transliteration:
rupavembudu rupada rupa
ellakkakoo moolavaada rupa ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu rupadali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 355 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Beauty is the essence of beauty, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without beauty. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true beauty - not just external appearance but the inner radiance that comes from purity and harmony. True beauty is the foundation of all aesthetic experience.

kannadaText:
ಸಿದ್ಧಿವೆಂಬುದು ಸಿದ್ಧಿದ ಸಿದ್ಧಿ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸಿದ್ಧಿ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸಿದ್ಧಿದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 356 ॥
transliteration:
siddhivembudu siddhida siddhi
ellakkakoo moolavaada siddhi ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu siddhidali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 356 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Perfection is the essence of perfection, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without perfection. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the nature of true perfection - not just flawlessness but the complete expression of one's potential. True perfection is the foundation of all excellence.

kannadaText:
ಧರ್ಮವೆಂಬುದು ಧರ್ಮದ ಧರ್ಮ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಧರ್ಮ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಧರ್ಮದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 357 ॥
transliteration:
dharmavembudu dharmada dharma
ellakkakoo moolavaada dharma ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu dharmadali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 357 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Righteousness is the essence of righteousness, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without righteousness. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the fundamental importance of dharma (righteousness) in life. Dharma is not just a concept but the very foundation upon which all other virtues and principles are built.

kannadaText:
ಕರ್ಮವೆಂಬುದು ಕರ್ಮದ ಕರ್ಮ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಕರ್ಮ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಕರ್ಮದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 358 ॥
transliteration:
karmavembudu karmada karma
ellakkakoo moolavaada karma ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu karmadali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 358 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Action is the essence of action, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without action. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of karma - not just action but the law of cause and effect that governs all existence. True karma is action performed with awareness and responsibility.

kannadaText:
ಮೋಕ್ಷವೆಂಬುದು ಮೋಕ್ಷದ ಮೋಕ್ಷ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಮೋಕ್ಷ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಮೋಕ್ಷದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 359 ॥
transliteration:
mokshavembudu mokshada moksha
ellakkakoo moolavaada moksha ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu mokshadali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 359 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Liberation is the essence of liberation, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without liberation. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about moksha - the ultimate liberation from the cycle of birth and death. True liberation is freedom from all attachments and the realization of one's true nature.

kannadaText:
ಯೋಗವೆಂಬುದು ಯೋಗದ ಯೋಗ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಯೋಗ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಯೋಗದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 360 ॥
transliteration:
yogavembudu yogada yoga
ellakkakoo moolavaada yoga ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu yogadali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 360 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Union is the essence of union, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without union. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the true nature of yoga - not just physical exercise but the union of individual consciousness with the universal consciousness. Yoga is the path to self-realization.

kannadaText:
ಧ್ಯಾನವೆಂಬುದು ಧ್ಯಾನದ ಧ್ಯಾನ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಧ್ಯಾನ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಧ್ಯಾನದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 361 ॥
transliteration:
dhyanavembudu dhyanada dhyana
ellakkakoo moolavaada dhyana ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu dhyanadali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 361 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Meditation is the essence of meditation, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without meditation. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of meditation in spiritual practice. True meditation is not just sitting quietly but the focused concentration that leads to inner peace and self-realization.

kannadaText:
ಜ್ಞಾನವೆಂಬುದು ಜ್ಞಾನದ ಜ್ಞಾನ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಜ್ಞಾನ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಜ್ಞಾನದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 362 ॥
transliteration:
jnanavembudu jnanada jnana
ellakkakoo moolavaada jnana ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu jnanadali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 362 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Wisdom is the essence of wisdom, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without wisdom. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of wisdom - not just knowledge but the ability to apply knowledge rightly and make good decisions. True wisdom is the foundation of all success.

kannadaText:
ವಿದ್ಯೆವೆಂಬುದು ವಿದ್ಯೆದ ವಿದ್ಯೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ವಿದ್ಯೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ವಿದ್ಯೆದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 363 ॥
transliteration:
vidyevembudu vidyeda vidye
ellakkakoo moolavaada vidye ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu vidyedali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 363 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Knowledge is the essence of knowledge, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without knowledge. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true knowledge - not just information but understanding and wisdom. True knowledge is the foundation of all learning and growth.

kannadaText:
ಭಕ್ತಿವೆಂಬುದು ಭಕ್ತಿದ ಭಕ್ತಿ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಭಕ್ತಿ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಭಕ್ತಿದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 364 ॥
transliteration:
bhaktivembudu bhaktida bhakti
ellakkakoo moolavaada bhakti ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu bhaktidali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 364 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Devotion is the essence of devotion, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without devotion. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true devotion - not just religious practice but the complete surrender of the ego to the divine. True devotion is the foundation of all spiritual progress.

kannadaText:
ಸೇವೆವೆಂಬುದು ಸೇವೆದ ಸೇವೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಸೇವೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಸೇವೆದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 365 ॥
transliteration:
sevevembudu seveda seve
ellakkakoo moolavaada seve ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu sevedali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 365 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Service is the essence of service, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without service. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of selfless service - not just helping others but serving with pure intention and without expectation of reward. True service is the foundation of all compassion.

kannadaText:
ಕರುಣೆವೆಂಬುದು ಕರುಣೆದ ಕರುಣೆ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಕರುಣೆ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಕರುಣೆದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 366 ॥
transliteration:
karunevembudu karuneda karune
ellakkakoo moolavaada karune ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu karunedali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 366 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Compassion is the essence of compassion, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without compassion. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true compassion - not just sympathy but the ability to feel and alleviate the suffering of others. True compassion is the foundation of all love.

kannadaText:
ಪ್ರೇಮವೆಂಬುದು ಪ್ರೇಮದ ಪ್ರೇಮ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಪ್ರೇಮ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಪ್ರೇಮದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 367 ॥
transliteration:
premavembudu premada prema
ellakkakoo moolavaada prema ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu premadali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 367 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Love is the essence of love, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without love. Salutations to that wondrous one.
meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse speaks about the nature of true love - not just emotion but the unconditional acceptance and care for all beings. True love is the foundation of all relationships.

kannadaText:
ಶಾಂತಿವೆಂಬುದು ಶಾಂತಿದ ಶಾಂತಿ
ಎಲ್ಲಕ್ಕೂ ಮೂಲವಾದ ಶಾಂತಿ ॥
ಆವುದನು ಪಡೆಯಲಾಗದು ಶಾಂತಿದಲಿ
ಆ ವಿಚಿತ್ರಕೆ ನಮಿಸೊ - ಮಂಕುತಿಮ್ಮ ॥ 368 ॥
transliteration:
shantivembudu shantida shanti
ellakkakoo moolavaada shanti ॥
aavudanu padeyalaagadu shantidali
ಆ vichitrakke namiso - Mankutimma ॥ 368 ॥
englishTranslation: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] Peace is the essence of peace, the foundation of everything. We cannot attain anything without peace. Salutations to that wondrous one.

meaning: [NEEDS RELIABLE SOURCE] This verse emphasizes the importance of self-discipline and control over one's senses and mind. True self-control is the foundation of all personal growth and spiritual progress.
